title: Table tail class name
content: Add a class name to the cell at the end of the table through the table column attribute footer-class-name or the function Function({$rowIndex, column, columnIndex, $columnIndex}) .
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.

title: Merge Rows or Columns at the Table Foot
content:
Use footer-method and footer-span-method to set the total row or column logic of the table tail. show-footer

must be configured
